name: The Fall (itch) (Sofia, KrOOb)
description:
You are the tree!

Survive for as long as possible by keeping humans away from your trunk.

Your only weapons are your leaves and your fruit.

Controls:

  • Left Arrow: blow leaves to the left
  • Right Arrow: blow leaves to the right
  • Space: drop fruit
  • Enter: start / pause / unpause
  • R: restart game
  • M: mute game
  • ESC: exit game

A Weekend Jam #2 entry.
Code+Music by Sofia Faro (@typeswitch).
Art by João Agostinho (@The_KrOOb).
